name: Toilet Renaissance
description:
Hi.
This is jeff.
My pet tortoise.
We were walking around as usual when I noticed the toilet exhibition.
Jeff was already tired but I was too interested.
So while Jeff is having a nap on my hand I decided to check out the exhibition.
I should be quiet or Jeff will wake up and be in a bad mood all day!

Controls:
Space - skip/continue dialogue 
LMB - interact
